HEC Workshop

International Workshop on Human-Engaged Computing.

CHI 2017

CHEC members had totally 7 papers including 2 Full Papers (1 awarded as best paper), 2 Notes, 1 Workshop, 1 Late-Breaking Work and 1 Panel.

CHI 2015

CHEC members: Prof. Xiangshi Ren, Chaky, Sayan, Dim and Handy attended CHI 2015 conference at Seoul, Korea.
